attributes.action: Show remaining England games at Wembley stadium, because football's coming home
attributes.additional_details: Evidence? Beam-backs are incredible. Wembley is incredible. England winning the World Cup is incredible.
attributes.background: There's 3 things to be certain of this summer- Adam will fall in love again on Love Island, brits will get burnt, and England will win the World Cup. And where better to watch the rundown to the greatest footballing accomplishment in over 50 years than the home of English football- Wembley Stadium.
